original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields down, rupee closes at 306.50/307.25 to US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka rupee closed at 306.50/307.25 to the US dollar on Wednesday, while bond yields were down.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed at 22.60/90 percent, down from yesterday’s close at 22.90/23.10 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2025 closed at 26.50/70 percent, down from yesterday’s 27.05/15 percent.
Three-months maturing bill closed at 22.50/75 percent, up from its last close at 21.75/22.30 percent.
A six-month maturing bill closed at 19.00/10 percent steady from 19.00/20.25 percent from at its last close. (Colombo/ June 21/2023)
